subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Hiroki Kuroda, who has been a stalwart presence this season, gave up five runs and eight hits in two-plus innings, his earned-run average increasing to 2.67 from 1.99.
snippet: Hiroki Kuroda, who has been a stalwart presence this season, gave up five runs and eight hits in two-plus innings, his earned-run average increasing to 2.67 from 1.99.
